Package gw.plugin.apd

Interface IApdRepositoryPlugin

All Superinterfaces:
InitializablePlugin, InternalPlugin, Remote
public interface IApdRepositoryPlugin extends InternalPlugin, InitializablePlugin
Plugin used to finalize APD code generation

    Methods inherited from interface gw.plugin.InitializablePlugin

    setParameters

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      void setUp()
      Clone the repository. Repository, key and path are configured via plugin parameters. The clone will checkout the commit hash specified in the environment variable. If the given commit hash cannot be resolved, the clone will checkout the latest commit on master.

    • getCloneDirectory

      String getCloneDirectory()
      Get path to the cloned repository.

    • isExistingBranch

      boolean isExistingBranch(String branchName)
      Check if the branch exists
      Parameters:
      branchName - - branch name to check
      Returns:
      - true if the branch exists, false otherwise

    • isValidBranchName

      boolean isValidBranchName(String branchName)
      Checks if the branch name is legal in git
      Parameters:
      branchName - - branch name to check
      Returns:
      true if the branch name is legal, false otherwise

    • normalizeBranchName

      String normalizeBranchName(String branchName)
      Attempts to normalize the branch name to follow the git pattern
      Parameters:
      branchName - - branch name to check
      Returns:
      suggestion of a legal branch name

    • finalizeCodeGen

      String finalizeCodeGen(String branchName)
      Commits all current changes and pushes to the specified branch in the repository defined in plugin parameters.
      Parameters:
      branchName - - branch name to be created
      Returns:
      revision of the commit as String

    • tearDown

      void tearDown()
      Removes directory to which repo was cloned
